listitem.simpara: The attribute uidNumber can now be accessed by teachers, staff and school administrators in temporary objects container. This is required to create working groups (39967).

The number of squid's helper processes (basic auth, NTLM auth, krb5 auth) has been increased to 50 if the UCR value has not been changed manually. Additionally the number of rewrite processes will be increased to 20. This is done by changing the UCR variables squid/.../children (Bug 40091).
When stopping the exam mode, the attribute memberUid for computers at the exam group OU${OU}-Klassenarbeit is now handled correctly (39600).
